TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemIcons extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別的每一個屬性皆為整個 Windows 系統圖示的 物件。

span.span: Each property of the class is an object for Windows system-wide icons.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何載入點陣圖，以從處理，請使用列舉型別，以及使用繪製點陣圖的矩形界限的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an handle, using the enumeration, and the use of the method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含名為 Button2 的按鈕。Create a form that contains a button named Button2. 程式碼貼入表單，並將這個方法與按鈕產生關聯`Click`事件。Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.Icon Application { get; }
.property class System.Drawing.Icon Application
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Application As Icon
public: static property System::Drawing::Icon ^ Application { System::Drawing::Icon ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，這個物件含有預設的應用程式圖示 (WIN32: IDI_APPLICATION)。

span.span: Gets an object that contains the default application icon (WIN32: IDI_APPLICATION).

value.span: 物件，含有預設的應用程式圖示。

span.span: An object that contains the default application icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 的指導方針建議您使用旁邊或其預設動作為需要系統管理員權限的提升權限的任何控制項上的盾牌圖示。The User Account Control (UAC) guidelines recommend the use of the shield icon next to or on any control whose default action is to require an elevation to administrator privileges. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 上的 「 Windows Vista 使用者經驗指導方針 」 的 「 使用者帳戶控制 」 一節。For more information, see the "User Account Control" section of the "Windows Vista User Experience Guidelines" on MSDN.
